history.proof: intros h n H. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHn. qsimpl time: 1 use: S.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type h : nat -> stream A n : nat H : is_inf_stream (h 0) IHn : partial_stream_clen h n = (0, n) E : h 0 (S n) = None Unable to unify "(0, S n)" with "(1, 0)".

original: intros h n H. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHn. destruct (h 0 (S n)) as [a|] eqn:E; [ | reflexivity]. exfalso. apply H. auto.
